name: terraform-digitalocean-opnsense-image
description: Terraform module to create a Digital Ocean Droplet snapshot-image that can subsequently be used to start an OPNsense  instance within Digital Ocean.  * [OPNsense](https://www.opnsense.org/)  * [Digital Ocean](https://www.digitalocean.com/)

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m Build && git push
